ServerMgmt.Subtitle: Manage and monitor your CS2 server instances

PluginMarket.Title: üß© Plugin Market
PluginMarket.Subtitle: Browse and install CS2 server plugins to enhance server functionality
PluginMarket.NoPluginsHint: Try adjusting your search criteria or category, or try again later

LogConsole.Title: Log Console
LogConsole.Subtitle: View server logs in real-time and send console commands
LogConsole.NoLogsHint: Logs will appear here after starting the server

Settings.Title: ‚öôÔ∏è Settings
Settings.Subtitle: Configure application and server options
Settings.AppearanceDesc: Customize interface theme and language options
Settings.AutoCheckUpdatesDesc: Automatically check for application updates on startup
Settings.AutoDownloadSteamCmdDesc: Automatically download SteamCMD if not installed
Settings.MinimizeToTrayDesc: Minimize to system tray instead of exiting when clicking close button

Download.Title: üì• Download Manager
Download.Subtitle: Monitor and manage all download tasks
Download.NoTasksHint: Download tasks will appear here when you install servers or plugins

Msg.AlreadyRunning:
CSP2 is already running!

Please check the system tray icon.
Msg.LanguageChanged: Language changed successfully! Some UI elements may require application restart to take effect.
Msg.FirstClosePrompt:
When clicking the close button, would you like to:

[Yes] - Minimize to system tray (keep program running)
[No] - Exit program completely

You can change this option later in Settings.
Msg.SteamCmdInstallFailedMsg: SteamCMD installation failed, please check the logs for details.
Msg.UninstallConfirm:
Are you sure you want to uninstall SteamCMD?

This will delete all SteamCMD related files.
Msg.SteamCmdUninstallFailedMsg: SteamCMD uninstall failed, please check the logs for details.

Log.Title: üìã Log Console
Log.Subtitle: View server output and send commands

ServerInstall.SelectModeDesc: Choose how to install your CS2 server
ServerInstall.SteamCmdModeDesc: Automatically download latest CS2 server files
ServerInstall.ExistingModeDesc: Add an already installed CS2 server
ServerInstall.DownloadPathDesc: Server files will be downloaded to this directory
ServerInstall.NoExistingFound:
No existing CS2 installations detected.

Please choose SteamCMD download mode.
ServerInstall.SteamCmdNotInstalledMsg:
SteamCMD is not installed yet. To download the server using SteamCMD, you need to install it first (~2-3MB).

The download process will be divided into two steps:
1. Install SteamCMD (~2-3MB)
2. Download CS2 server files (~30GB)

Do you want to continue?

ServerOps.PathValidationFailed:
Failed to add server

{0}

Tip: The server path must contain valid CS2 server files (game/bin/win64/cs2.exe).
You can:
1. Use [Install Server] to auto-download server files
2. Select an existing CS2 game installation path
ServerOps.DeleteConfirmSteam:
Are you sure you want to remove server '{0}' from CSP2?

Path: {1}

‚ö†Ô∏è Warning: This server uses Steam-installed CS2 files!
Deletion will only remove the server configuration from CSP2, and will not affect your Steam game files.

If you want to completely remove server files, please use the [Uninstall] function (for servers installed via CSP2 only).
ServerOps.DeleteConfirmExisting:
Are you sure you want to remove server '{0}' from CSP2?

Path: {1}

This operation will only delete the server configuration from CSP2, not the server files.
Server files will remain in their original location.
ServerOps.DeleteConfirmManaged:
Are you sure you want to remove server '{0}' from CSP2?

Path: {1}

This operation will only delete the server configuration from CSP2, not the server files.

üí° Tip: If you want to delete server files as well, please use the [Uninstall] button.
ServerOps.SteamFilesRetained: Steam game files will be retained
ServerOps.UninstallSteamWarn:
Unable to uninstall server '{0}'!

This server uses Steam-installed CS2 files and should not be deleted.

If you want to remove this server from CSP2, please use the [Delete] function.
This will only delete the configuration in CSP2 and will not affect Steam game files.
ServerOps.UninstallNonManagedWarn:
Warning: Server '{0}' was not installed via CSP2!

Path: {1}

Uninstalling will delete all files in this path!
If this path contains other important data, it may cause data loss.

Are you sure you want to continue?
ServerOps.UninstallConfirmMsg:
You are about to uninstall server '{0}' and delete all its files!

Path: {1}

‚ö†Ô∏è Warning: This operation is irreversible!
‚Ä¢ Server configuration will be deleted
‚Ä¢ All server files will be deleted
‚Ä¢ Plugin data and configurations will be deleted

Are you sure you want to continue?

Dialog.RestartMessage: Settings have been changed and require a restart to take full effect.
Dialog.RestartWarning: All running server instances will be closed after restart.
Dialog.ServerPathHint: Select CS2 server root directory (containing game folder)
Dialog.ErrorHint: üí° Tip: You can select text and press Ctrl+C to copy
Dialog.ServerIdentityDesc: Configure server display name and authentication information in-game
Dialog.ServerDisplayNameTooltip: Name displayed in server browser (leave empty to use server name)
Dialog.SteamTokenTooltip: Required to display server in internet server list, obtain at https://steamcommunity.com/dev/managegameservers
Dialog.SteamTokenHint: üí° Public servers require Steam token, obtain at https://steamcommunity.com/dev/managegameservers
Dialog.ServerPasswordTooltip: Password players must enter to join the server (leave empty for no password)
Dialog.RconPasswordTooltip: Remote console password for managing server remotely via RCON
Dialog.LanModeTooltip: Enable LAN mode, server will not be listed in internet server browser
Dialog.InsecureModeTooltip: Disable Valve Anti-Cheat (VAC), allows modified clients to connect
Dialog.ProcessPriorityTooltip: Set CPU priority for server process
Dialog.MaxFpsTooltip: Limit server maximum frame rate (leave empty for unlimited)
Dialog.ThreadCountTooltip: Number of worker threads server uses (leave empty for auto-detect)
Dialog.DisableHltvTooltip: Disable HLTV (Half-Life TV) / GOTV spectator system
Dialog.BotQuotaTooltip: Number of AI bots in server (0 for no bots)
Dialog.KickIdleTimeTooltip: Auto-kick players idle longer than this time (leave empty to disable)
Dialog.ConsoleLogToFileTooltip: Save console output to log file
Dialog.IPAddressTooltip: IP address server binds to (0.0.0.0 to listen on all interfaces)
Dialog.InitialMapTooltip: Map to load when server starts
Dialog.MaxPlayersTooltip: Maximum number of players allowed on server
Dialog.TickRateTooltip: Server tick rate, higher is smoother but uses more performance
Dialog.MapGroupTooltip: Map group name for map rotation
